headline: Western Digital’s AI Storage Shift Puts Hyperscaler Roadmap In Focus
summary: Western Digital is repositioning itself as an AI infrastructure provider, centered on new hard drive technologies and high capacity roadmaps. The company is pursuing a dual ePMR and HAMR approach, with plans for 40TB and future 100TB HDDs aimed at large cloud and AI customers. Multi year procurement agreements with major hyperscalers such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud are intended to secure demand for these drives.
